tasks.label: Compile and run with input/output redirection (macOS, g++-15)
args: cp "${file}" "${workspaceFolder}/jspwTest.cpp" && /opt/homebrew/bin/g++-15 -g -Wall -Wextra -std=c++17 "${workspaceFolder}/jspwTest.cpp" -o "${workspaceFolder}/jspwTest" && if [ -f "${workspaceFolder}/jspwTest" ]; then "${workspaceFolder}/jspwTest" < input.txt > output.txt && rm "${workspaceFolder}/jspwTest" "${workspaceFolder}/jspwTest.cpp"; else echo Compilation failed; fi
tasks.detail: Compiles and runs CSES solution using g++-15 with input/output redirection and cleans up temporary files on macOS
